name: Adventures Of The Lost Fighter
description:
--------------------------

Early Alpha 5.0

--------------------------

Keys:

Arrow keys or AWDS to move around.

Enter key to open doors and interact with NPCS

Control key to attack.

i key for menu.

--------------------------

Works best in full screen. 

Might not work in all browsers. 

--------------------------

Sneak peek of the side project I’ve been working on.

 

There will be bugs and a lot of unfished things.
